name: Hansel & Grethel with Bertel
description:
"HANSEL & GRETHEL WITH BERTEL"

Hansel & Grethel with Bertel is a game that was based from the original tale, Grimms Brothers, and the Witch Hunters movie. There will be different versions and endings to encourage players to engage more in the storyline! 

Enjoy the taste of adventure that awaits you...
